name: Sorcerer's Spire
description:
Oh snap, it's the long awaited update to the smash hit Sorcerer's Spire, I did not forget to upload the final project for an entire year.

Sorcerer's Spire is a tower defence games where the player must use an arsenal of elemental spells to fend off a horde of demons.

A fun, little game made by myself and a group of friends for our bachelors. It's not that pretty and honestly a little broken, you'll know when it's done when the lag prevents all the demons from moving (Just press Esc repeatedly).

Play it, it's fun
